0.1.2 (2022-12-11)
==================

- Fixed bug that caused ``-P time`` to also match ``package.timeseries``. [#7]

- Dropped Python 3.6 support.

0.1.1 (2020-01-09)
==================

- Fixed bug that caused e.g. ``-P sub`` to not match ``package.sub.other``. [#1]

0.1 (2020-01-09)
================

- Initial version.
